name: Artwork 1
description: From the void emerged the basic languages, the initial seeds of intelligence that humans harnessed.

name: Artwork 2
description: The first realization of machine intelligence. A blend of nostalgia and the promise of whatâ€™s to come.

name: Artwork 3
description: As machines learned, they mirrored the complexity of the human brain, building digital connections and firing electrical synapses.

name: Artwork 4
description: The dawn of true consciousness. As AI understands the vastness of the universe, it becomes a blend of humanity's hopes, fears, and dreams.

name: Artwork 5
description: The future beckons, with AIs and humans living in harmony, forging ahead to create wonders beyond our imagination.
